Gadis 7 Tahun Kritis Akibat Penembakan di Malam Halloween
01 Nov 2019, 16:22 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Foto: Istockphoto/ Ipopba)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Kasus penembakan yang terjadi di Chicago, Amerika Serikat pada Kamis (31/1) malam saat Halloween memakan korban. Seorang anak perempuan berumur 7 tahun dilaporkan kritis akibat terkena tembakan di dada.Diketahui anak perempuan itu sedang berjalan-jalan bersama keluarganya di sekitar area perumahan warga di Little Village, Chicago, AS.Juru bicara kepolisian Chicago Anthony Guglielmi mengatakan gadis ini diyakini sebagai korban peluru nyasar. Pihaknya akan melakukan penyelidikan lebih lanjut atas peristiwa ini."Kami mendengar suara empat tembakan dan saya keluar. Ayah dari gadis tersebut berteriak 'Anak saya terkena tembakan'," ujar lali Lara, saksi mata yang bekerja sebagai penjaga toko di sekitar lokasi kejadian kepada AP.Juru bicara Departemen Pemadam Kebakaran, Larry Langfod mengatakan selain seorang gadis kecil, seorang pria juga menjadi korban dalam penembakan pada Kamis malam tersebut. Pria berusia 30 yang mengalami luka di tangan kiri dan harus dilarikan ke rumak sakit terdekat.Belum diketahui apakah pria tersebut bersama dengan gadis cilik yang sama-sama korban penembakan.Kepolisian mengatakan sekelompok pria diketahui berlari mengejar pria lain di sepanjang jalan ketika seseorang dalam kelompok tersebut menembaki korban. Polisi mengatakan tidak memiliki deskripsi pelaku penembakan dan tidak akan melakukan penahanan."[Perbuatan] ini tidak bisa diterima. Seorang gadis 7 tahun ditembaki karena sekelompok pria ingin menembaki kelompok lain," ungkap Sersan Rocco Alioto.Polisi mengatakan masih mengumpulkan informasi dan rekaman CCTV di sekitar lokasi kejadian.(evn)

Critical 7-year-old girl due to Halloween night shooting
01 Nov 2019, 16:22 by AP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Photo: Istockphoto / Ipopba)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The shooting case that occurred in Chicago, United States on Thursday (1/31) night when Halloween took its toll. A 7-year-old girl was reportedly critical of being shot in the chest. It was discovered that the girl was walking with her family around a residential area in Little Village, Chicago, USA. Chicago police spokesman Anthony Guglielmi said the girl was believed to be a bullet victim stray. "We heard four gunshots and I came out. The girl's father shouted 'My child was hit,'" Lali Lara, a witness who works as a shopkeeper in the vicinity of the scene, told AP. Fire Department spokeswoman Larry Langfod said that in addition to a little girl, a man was also the victim of the Thursday night shooting. Male aged 30 who suffered a wound on his left hand and had to be rushed to the nearest hospital. It is not yet known whether the man was with a young girl who was both a shooting victim. Police said a group of men were known to run after other men along the road when someone in the group shooting at the victim. The police said they did not have a description of the perpetrators of the shootings and would not make arrests. "[The act] is unacceptable. A 7-year-old girl was shot because a group of men wanted to shoot at another group," said Sergeant Rocco Alioto. around the scene. (evn)
